author: dpsenner
msg: LOG4NET-376 extended the lock around s_lastTimeStrings in AbsoluteTimeDateFormatter
This fix should prevent obstructed output in multithreaded environments.

msg: LUCENE-4944: smoke tester detects duplicate sections in changes.html

msg: LUCENE-4993: Fix BeiderMorseFilter to preserve custom attributes when inserting tokens with position increment 0.

author: dpsenner
msg: LOG4NET-376 fixed a race condition in AbsoluteTimeDateFormatter by adding a lock around s_lastTimeStrings

author: stefan2
msg: On the fsfs-format7 branch:  drop the copy-from cache previously attached
to each svn_fs_root_t object.  Creation and maintenance overhead by far
outweights the gains because most are now backed by the dag node cache.
(fold_change): remove code that filled the copyfrom_cache
link fsap_data directly to root_dir now
